Reviews.Title: “Feels like home!”
Reviews.Author: leslie V
Reviews.Content: The staff there is great! Once i walked in I felt welcomed especially by the front desk rep.(i believe her name was Nayeli) she was very friendly and helpful. My whole experience was fantastic!! The hotel is very clean and updated. I will definatley recommend this hotel to family and friends :)

HotelInfo.Name: Extended StayAmerica San Diego-Mission Valley
HotelInfo.Address: 3860 Murphy Canyon Rd, San Diego, CA 92123
